message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you and we're confident it will meet all your needs. For this round, I'm offering it to you for $110. Let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm looking to pay closer to $100 for this product.  Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider it. For this round, I propose to offer the product for $105. This is my best offer based on the value I place on the transaction. Please let me know if this works for you.
